about_the_game:
Party Hard 2: Breakout comic book is a final installment in the Party Hard franchise. Picking the story up after the events of Party Hard 2 and Alien Butt Form DLC, it marks the last return of the infamous masked killer and his wacky bunch.
  • A huge 30-page comic drawn fully in color
  • A rousing action-packed adventure: find out what happened after Party Hard 2 end credits rolled!
  • Your favorite heroes, among whom are Party Hard Killer and his girlfriend Marena, join the cast of brand new characters
  • A surprise cameo awaits Party Hard 1 fans
  • Unique art style that blends Party Hard's visuals with comics aesthetics
  • User friendly navigation and kick-ass synthwave score
  • Bonus pages featuring comic book concepts and sketches
  • Free for all game owners
  • To launch the comic book, please go the Party Hard 2 game folder:
    \Party Hard 2\ComicBook[/b][/list]
    We highly recommend you to play Party Hard 2 and Party Hard 2: Alien Butt Form DLC before delving into Breakout to avoid story spoilers.

content_descriptors.notes: Party Hard 2 contains frequent use of alcohol, drugs, and corny cartoon violence. It's a dark humor game that may not be appropriate for all audiences.

name: Party Hard 2 Comic Book DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Masked killer and his nutsy companions return one last time in this 30-page full-color comic, a thrill ride culmination of the Party Hard story. Available now for FREE.
